content: experience true comfort as you curl up with this spectacular crochet throw in a rich warm berry red color red heart with love makes it so inviting just as designed but the bobble and post stitch patterns would look just as elaborate in any shade that matches your décor it s a perfect gift throw but don t forget to make one for yourself previously available at joann s https //web archive org/web/20081031115732if_/http //www joann com 80/static/project/0608/pa00003 pdf supplies & tools 62 oz essentials tlc® worsted weight yarn cranberry crochet hook us i-9 or 60 oz heathers tlc® worsted weight yarn smoke green crochet hook us j-10 afghan measures 49 x63 gauge in single_crochet -12 sts=4 16 row=4
